description.value:
Produces fake distress communications that can be detected up to 5 VU's away. Setting it up requires one hour and -20 Tech-Use Test. Can be determined as false by making Scrutiny Test with -10 per DoS on the Tech-Use test.

Requirements

Poor or Common Quality Voidbait.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
